<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues/comments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"仓库所属空间地址(企业、组织或个人的地址path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"仓库路径(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"since","in":"query","description":"起始的更新时间，要求时间格式为 ISO 8601: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"当前的页码","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":1}},{"name":"per_page","in":"query","description":"每页的数量，最大为 100","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":20}},{"name":"direction","in":"query","description":"Either asc or desc. Ignored without the sort parameter.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"sort","in":"query","description":"Either created or updated. Default: created","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
